Event.MetaDescription: Please come and attend the finest vocal duo of the carnatic music world, Carnatica Brothers on 28th July 2012 at West Kensington, London.
Event.Address: Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan, 4a Castletown Road, West Kensington, W14 9HE
Event.Maindescription:
Healing Ragas presents the finest vocal duo of the Carnatic music world, Carnatica Brothers

Accompanied by Dr Jyotsna Srikanth on violin and P.Kirupakaran on mridangam

Tickets £15, £12
(children under 5 free, snacks available to purchase)

All proceeds go to Shooting Star CHASE hospice care for children and teenagers for tickets please call 07947 038 480 (DR DEVARAJ), 020 7381 3086 (BHAVANS) or email healingragas@gmail.com

]]>
